import React, {useState} from "react" function FocusDuration () { const [focusDurations, SetFocusDurations] = useState([25]) const handleChange = (event) =>{ (event.target .className === "oi oi-minus") ? SetFocusDuration((focusDuration) => (parseInt(focusDuration) - 1)) : SetFocusDuration((focusDuration) => (parseInt(focusDuration) + 1)) } console.log(focusDuration) return
{/* TODO: Update this text to display the current focus session duration */} Focus Duration: {focusDuration}:00
{/* TODO: Implement decreasing focus duration and disable during a focus or break session */} {/* TODO: Implement increasing focus duration and disable during a focus or break session */}
} export default FocusDuration
